DESCRIPTION: Give a card to the mentioned user
SLASH_DESC: Enter the user you want to give the card to
SLASH_DESC2: Enter the code of the card that you want to give away
NO_SELF_GIVE: {{author}}, you cannot give the card to yourself
NO_CODE: {{author}}, you forgot to provide the card code
NO_CARD_FOUND: Cannot find card with the code: `{{code}}`
CARD_LOCKED: The card is locked and cannot be given. Untag the card to proceed
CARD_NOT_OWNED: You do not own the card anymore
